thread.title: Field hockey | Postseason preview
thread.title_full: Field hockey | Postseason preview | HamptonRoads.com | PilotOnline.com

author: Jami Frankenberry
title: Field hockey | Postseason preview
text:
FIELD HOCKEY The postseason gets under way today with Hampton Roads teams eyeing spots in the region and state tournaments.
Cox (Group 6A), Princess Anne (Group 5A) and Tabb (Group 4A) own No. 1 seeds in their conference tourneys after winning state titles last season.
A look at the conference tournament schedules involving Hampton Roads public-school teams:
Monday 
Conference 17 tournament 
Semifinals at ODU: #1 Great Bridge vs. #4 Churchland, 4 p.m.; #2 King's Fork vs. #3 Deep Creek, 5:15 p.m.
Monitor-Merrimac tournament 
Quarterfinal at Powhatan Field: #5 Oscar Smith vs. #4 Western Branch, 6 p.m.
PenSouth Conference tournament 
Quarterfinals at Christopher Newport: #4 Warwick vs. #5 Kecoughtan, 6 p.m.; #3 Menchville vs. #6 Hampton, 7:15 p.m.
Tuesday, Oct. 27 
Atlantic Conference tournament 
Semifinals at National Training Center, Virginia Beach: Field 2 - #1 Princess Anne vs. #4 Salem, 1 p.m; #2 Hickory vs. #3 Maury, 3 p.m.
Coastal Conference tournament 
Semifinals at National Training Center, Virginia Beach: Field 1 - #1 Cox vs. #4 Ocean Lakes, 1 p.m.; #2 First Colonial vs. #3 Kellam, 3 p.m.
Conference 27 tournament 
Semifinals at Bailey Field, Yorktown: #1 Tabb vs. #4 Phoebus, 3:30 p.m.; #2 York vs. #3 Lakeland, 5:15 p.m.
Monitor-Merrimac tournament 
Semifinals at Powhatan Field: Oscar Smith/Western Branch winner vs. #1 Grassfield, 5:30 p.m.; #2 Granby vs. #3 Woodside, 7 p.m.
PenSouth Conference tournament 
At Christopher Newport: Quarterfinal - #2 Nansemond River vs. #7 Bethel, 6 p.m.; semifinal - Warwick/Kecoughtan winner vs. #1 Gloucester, 7:15 p.m.
Wednesday, Oct. 28 
Conference 17 tournament 
Championship at ODU, 5 p.m.
PenSouth Conference tournament 
Semifinal at Christopher Newport: Menchville/Hampton winner vs. Nansemond River/Bethel winner, 2:30 p.m.
Thursday, Oct. 29 
Atlantic Conference tournament 
Championship at National Training Center: Field 2, 3 p.m.
Coastal Conference tournament 
Championship at National Training Center: Field 1, 3 p.m.
Conference 27 tournament 
Championship at Bailey Field, Yorktown, 3:30 p.m.
Monitor-Merrimac tournament 
Championship at Powhatan Field, 7 p.m.
PenSouth Conference tournament 
Championship at Christopher Newport, 6:30 p.m.
- Jami Frankenberry

in South Hampton Roads.
